content: this pdf pattern is written in us crochet terms and is for people with crochet knowledge -its fairly simple but you must know how to crochet as i do not teach you how in this pattern the pattern in pdf format includes recommendations on the selection of materials and tools very detailed crochet pattern on 5 pages photo process my help if necessary when using similar materials 14 cm - 5 5 any colour himalaya dolfin baby or yarn art dolce 100g - 120 m super bulky i use hook 4 5 mm it s better to take a smaller size than the one recommended for yarn red yarn for eyes yellow for beak and paws toy stuffing hollofiber filling scissors good mood you are most welcome to contact me if you have any questions about the pattern i would love to see your finished toy as well this pattern is only for free personal use you are not allowed to translate sell or distribute this pattern without my permission please send a direct link to whoever wants to share this pattern you are free to sell your finished product
